name: Gravity manipulation
description:
An animation created for the Weekly Hour Game Jam W7 2017.

You've got some drops. They are falling in front of you. Shake your cursor (mouse or pad) to stop their fall.

Try to stop the creation of drops finding the bug ;-)

If you want to release an exagerate amount of water, then spam your space bar.

Enjoy ;-)

Credits :
splash animation : Julien / http://opengameart.org/users/julien
